reviewText: To cover this man's life and accomplishments in under 30 minutes is a difficult task. The documentary gives a wide brush stroke on the man and his life. Makes you want to find out more about him.

I was always a fan of Bill Veeck's, and was able to take advantage of his open door policy to all fans on several occasions. He brought joy to so many -- not my happenstance -- but by design. Everyone working in sports today should study his methods and adapt them to their situations.
